channel.title: lila on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in lila on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Today
item.description: (transcribed 5:32pm CST Thursday 23 January 2003) April 3 1:20AM. I finished 33 notecards out of 40 today. I can do the rest at school. I wrote Lila a big long letter. I did some extra Spanish work. I stayed after school and worked in Algebra and Spanish. I saw the Cougar Charms practice. Mmm, Mmm. Sweet pussy! 1:22 - It looks like no one can read this now...

item.title: letters
item.description: (transcribed 5:29pm CST Thursday 23 January 2003) 10:25 I just wrote 2 letters. To Christy and Erika. I just got one from Lila. You know what? Lila is awesome! I love her personality and she's into guys and sex and she gives good back massages... Wow! And I'm gonna get her at OKC. I can't believe she's 15 though. I would swear she's older than me. goodnight. 10:28
